about.title: Thoughtful Living
about.subtitle: Quality over quantity
about.content: Haven specializes in well-made home goods that stand the test of time. We believe your home should reflect your values - quality craftsmanship, sustainable materials, and timeless design. Every product is chosen with intention.

products.name: Hand-Thrown Ceramic Dinnerware Set
products.description: 16-piece dinnerware set by local artisan. Microwave and dishwasher safe. Each piece unique. Service for 4.

products.name: Organic Cotton Throw Blanket
products.description: Luxuriously soft organic cotton throw. Perfect weight for all seasons. Multiple neutral colors. Machine washable.

products.name: Solid Walnut Cutting Board
products.description: Heirloom-quality walnut cutting board. Hand-finished with food-safe oil. Makes a beautiful gift.

products.name: Handwoven Jute Area Rug
products.description: Natural jute area rug, handwoven by artisans. Durable and sustainable. Multiple sizes available.

products.name: Vintage-Inspired Glass Vase
products.description: Beautiful mouth-blown glass vase. Perfect for fresh or dried flowers. Timeless design.

products.name: Linen Napkin Set
products.description: Set of 4 pure linen napkins. Softens with each wash. Available in curated colors. Eco-friendly.
